description: We need a menu so users can switch between the Store, Admin, and POS. "Create a Client Component src/components/layout/Navbar.tsx. Design:A simple fixed header at the top with a white background and shadow.Logo on the left (text: 'KnBioStore').Navigation links on the right: 'Store', 'POS', 'Admin'.Use Shadcn Button (ghost variant) for links.Links should use Next.js Link component to route to /store, /pos, and /admin/products."
